queries.query: SELECT n.* FROM networks n LEFT JOIN usernetwork u ON n.networkID = u.networkID WHERE n.networkID = :id AND u.userID = :user
SELECT n.networkID, networkName FROM usernetwork u INNER JOIN networks n ON n.networkID = u.networkID WHERE u.userID = :id AND n.networkType = 'managed'
UPDATE networks SET snapshot = :data WHERE networkID = :id
UPDATE networks SET snapshot = CONCAT(snapshot,:data) WHERE networkID = :id
UPDATE networks SET networkName = :label, learningrate = :lr, targetmse = :mse, epochmax = :epoch, momentumrate = :momentum WHERE networkID = :id
SELECT n.networkID FROM networks n LEFT JOIN usernetwork u ON n.networkID = u.networkID WHERE n.networkID = :id AND u.userID = :user

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(t.userID) as users FROM (SELECT u2.userID FROM usernetwork u INNER JOIN usernetwork u2 ON u2.networkID = u.networkID WHERE u.userID = :id GROUP BY u2.userID) t) users, (SELECT COUNT(*) as networks FROM usernetwork u3 WHERE u3.userID = :id) networks, (SELECT COUNT(*) as trainsets FROM usernetwork u4 INNER JOIN trainsets t ON t.networkID = u4.networkID WHERE u4.userID = :id) trainsets, (SELECT ROUND(SUM(e.execTime),2) as exec FROM usernetwork u5 INNER JOIN epochs e ON u5.networkID = e.networkID WHERE u5.userID = :id) exec, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(e.endMSE),4) as mse FROM usernetwork u6 INNER JOIN epochs e ON u6.networkID = e.networkID WHERE u6.userID = :id) mse
DELETE FROM networks WHERE networkType = "unmanaged" AND DATEDIFF(now(),createdDate) > :n
